mapper.select: SELECT h.id id, h.building_id buildingId, h.building_name buildingName, h.unit_id unitId, h.unit_name unitName, h.code code, h.name name, h.owner_id ownerId, h.owner_name ownerName, h.area area, h.room_num roomNum, h.floor floor, h.telephone telephone, h.status status, h.refined_decoration refinedDecoration, h.description description, date_format(h.live_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') liveTime, date_format(h.gmt_create, '%Y-%m-%d %T') gmtCreate, date_format(h.gmt_modified, '%Y-%m-%d %T') gmtModified FROM tb_house h WHERE h.deleted = '0' ORDER BY h.id ASC LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}
